
Installation
*************
This page explains how to install FC-DFT code.

Requirements
=============
* PySCF
* PyAMG
* AMGCL
* Cython
* GPU4PySCF (optional)

How to install
==============
Download the lastest version of FC-DFT from the repository::

Go to the root directory and install the package::

    $ pip install .
